desc:
While capturing data for testing purposes, I have picked up the following issues on UAT:

1.	Applicant Date of birth defaults to 01/01/1900 on verify regardless of what was selected by comparison.
2.	If respondent ID is selected during comparison, verifier defaults to blank and doesnâ€™t show the ID number.
3.	Dependant escalation date defaults to 01/01/1900 regardless of what was selected by comparison.
4.	When putting amounts into medical aid field as a capturer, shows as clothing on verifer.

Please can these be resolved and tested by the developer before further testing is done by QA.
name: CW - CCW396 - I360 UAT issues
